original_text: We took such a violent battering from the storm that the next day they began to throw the cargo overboard.
korean_text: 우리가 풍랑으로 심히 애쓰다가 이튿날 사공들이 짐을 바다에 풀어 버리고

sentences.original_text: We took such a violent battering from the storm
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 폭풍으로 인해 그렇게 격렬한 타격을 받았습니다

sentences.original_text: that the next day they began
